title: Real Madrid 1-1 Atletico Madrid: Mbappe rescues leaders in top-of-the-table tussle
description: Real Madrid salvaged a 1-1 draw against city rivals Atletico Madrid in LaLiga on Saturday, with Kylian Mbappe cancelling out Julian Alvarez’s first-half penalty. That result kept reigning champions Madrid top of the table with 50 points, one clear of Atletico in second, as Los Colchoneros missed a chance to leapfrog them. It was a […] The post Real Madrid 1-1 Atletico Madrid: Mbappe rescues leaders in top-of-the-table tussle appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews

title: Arne Slot wants Real Madrid winger Brahim Díaz at Liverpool
description: Liverpool are interested in signing Brahim Díaz from Real Madrid in the summer transfer window, according to Fichajes. The report has claimed that the Premier League club’s manager Arne Slot personally wants the Morocco international winger at Anfield. Diaz joined Madrid from Manchester City in 2019 and was on loan at AC Milan from 2020 […] The post Arne Slot wants Real Madrid winger Brahim Díaz at Liverpool appeared first on Soccer News.
author: Jamie Jones
